item.description: This is a good old fashioned 912 standout with a twist...please join us in trying to rally the public for the most important election of our lives! Voter registration forms will be on hand and I am asking anyone interested in participating to bring some handouts of your favorite issue (Agenda 21, NDAA, etc etc etc) and be prepared to engage anyone who may stop in discussion! If noone stops, well, then we just have our rally and hand them info while they are stopped at the red light! Come early and stay until whenever!
item.name: WM912 Voter Registration Rally
